meta.title: Kava Bar Finder
meta.description: Find Kava bars worldwide – from Florida to New Zealand. With addresses, reviews, and opening hours.

search.placeholder: Search by name, city, or country...

empty.title: No Kava bars found
empty.description: Try different search terms or filters.

cta.title: Do you know a Kava bar?
cta.description: Help us expand the database! If you know a Kava bar that isn't listed here, let us know.

kavasutra-boca.description: One of the most well-known Kava bar chains in Florida with an authentic atmosphere and high-quality Kava varieties from Vanuatu and Fiji.

kavasutra-delray.description: KavaSutra uses the highest quality Kava from the island of Vanuatu. Used in ceremonies for thousands of years.

kavasutra-lake-worth.description: Locally owned Kava bar with a selection of traditionally prepared Kavas in a relaxed atmosphere.

bula-kafe-fort-lauderdale.description: Premium Kava bar in the heart of Las Olas with a Pacific flair and a wide selection of Noble Kava varieties.

bula-beach-madeira.description: Madeira Beach's first Kava bar! From the owner of Bula Kafe, the first Kava bar in Pinellas.

awa-na-kava.description: Relaxed Kava lounge with the finest Fijian Kava, hookahs, Kratom, and Kava Comedy Monday.

roots-miami.description: Urban Kava bar in Wynwood with an artistic ambiance and regular live music events.

green-spot-miami.description: Contemporary Kava bar, lounge, and retail location in Miami.

kavaculture-cape-coral-hq.description: The headquarters of the Kava Culture franchise chain with the largest selection of Kava varieties.

kavaculture-bonita-springs.description: Modern, upscale indoor/outdoor Kava bar in Bonita Springs.

kavaculture-clearwater.description: Relaxed Kava bar in Clearwater with happy hour from 2-5 PM.

kavaculture-downtown-ftmyers.description: Downtown Fort Myers Kava Culture with open mic nights, art, and delicious Kava cocktails.

kavaculture-fmb.description: Kava Culture FMB with Buddha Blends Vegan Kitchen. Outdoor beach bar, pool table, darts, open mics.

kavaculture-key-west.description: Kava Culture in Key West - tropical vibes and premium Kava.

kavaculture-port-charlotte.description: Kava Culture Port Charlotte with beach vibes, outdoor beach by the canal.

kavaculture-estero.description: Kava Culture in Estero with a convenient location.

kavaculture-lake-mary.description: Kava Culture in Lake Mary - relaxed atmosphere.

kavakaze-tallahassee.description: Kavakaze is a Kava bar in Tallahassee with Kava, tea, and a relaxed place to chill.

island-root-melbourne.description: Downtown Melbourne FL Island Root Kava Bar.

dharma-hookah-largo.description: Dharma Hookah Lounge is the Kava-Java hookah lounge with coffee, teas, Kava, Kratom, and hookah.

kava-kula-ormond.description: Kava Kula offers premium Kava in a relaxed beach atmosphere.

kava-social-stpete.description: Kava Social is a social gathering place with Kava, tea, and community events.

nakava-gainesville.description: NaKava offers authentic Kava for the university town of Gainesville.
